hypothesis_content.title: Volatility Compression Breakout Regime Transition
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC 20-day realized volatility falls below 30% (compression) while price remains within 5% of 30-day high during NEUTRAL regime, a breakout above the 20-day Bollinger Band upper band with volume > 1.5x 20-day average signals transition to BULL regime with 85% probability over next 5 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Volatility compression near highs suggests accumulation before breakout. Low volatility in NEUTRAL regime indicates indecision that typically resolves directionally. Breakout with volume confirms institutional participation.
entry_conditions: BTC closes above 20-day Bollinger Band upper band

exit_conditions.take_profit: 10% gain from entry or regime shifts to BULL (confirmed by regime model)
exit_conditions.time_exit: 5 trading days without regime transition confirmation

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 35% of signals result in false breakouts (return below entry within 3 days) OR less than 60% accuracy in predicting BULL regime within 5 days.
